To synchronize your chat logs to the new device, make sure both devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi or hotspot.

Synchronize your chat logs from the Mixin Messenger desktop. Synchronization will not overwrite local records but will only sync incrementally. Please make sure the two devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi or hotspot.

allow app to ask for your approval to make a transaction.

Unable to estimate asset changes. Please make sure you trust this app.

if the transaction is too far along cancellation may bot be possible.
if the transaction is too far along cancellation may bot be possible.

Financial regulations require us to verify your identity. To start verifying, you will allow us and our service provides can collect, use, and store your information. Before you star, please:
Check if your device’s camera is uncovered and working
Be prepared to take a selfie and photos of your ID
By proceeding, you agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
Your identity is being verified. We will send you a message once your verification has completed.
Your verification failed, possibly because some required identification documents were not submitted or there was a problem with some documents.
Your verification failed, possibly because there was a problem with some documents, please click the button below to contact with us.
We need you to submit additional information to meet regulatory requirements, thank you for your understanding and support.
The user has deleted the account.
You haven\'t added any card yet.
Payment request has been submitted, your payment and order information is being checked, please wait patiently
Successful purchase of %1$s ! %2$s will be transferred directly to Mixin wallet.

Current transfer is using legacy network
Send to an address in your Address Book, PIN-protected to prevent phishing.
Send to my other wallet using a crypto network.
Send to your Mixin friends with privacy, zero fees, and instant delivery.
Send to your Privacy Wallet to keep your assets safe and hidden from potential risks.
%1$s withdrawals are temporarily suspended, possibly due to node failure, blockchain network hard fork, or congestion. Please try again later.
Your number of UTXOs exceeds 256. For sending experience, please enter the PIN to consolidating UTXOs before operating.

Your %1$s deposit address has been updated. The deposit address will automatically update with system or network upgrades. Old addresses are still valid for deposits, but it is not recommended for further use.
You’ll be asked for it periodically to help you remember it.
You have a transfer or withdrawal has not been completed, please try again later
You can add a maximum of 5 favorite bots. Please be aware that others can view these bots on your profile.
Leave a message to Team Mixin
Link Mixin Messenger Desktop by QR code
Please check the payee, network and amount carefully. If you make a mistake, the asset will not be recovered!
Please check the collection address, network and amount carefully. If you make a mistake, the asset will not be recovered!
What about biometric? Once enabled, you can expedite authentication with biometric.
Merchant payment is complete. You can opt to return to the merchant or stay in Mixin.
Want to enable biometric payment? Once enabled, you can quickly complete payments by verifying your biometric when transferring asset.
Review the address, Memo (tag), and network. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
Are you sure to delete this address?
Review the address, Memo (tag), and network. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
Review the recipient, network, and amount. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
Review the address, network, and amount meticulously. Any mistake may result in irretrievable asset loss.
Transfer request successful. The recipient will promptly receive it.
Withdrawal request successful. Please wait a moment.
Address has been added. You can immediately use this address for withdrawals.
This transaction has enough signatures, the current one is ignored.
The address %1$s(%2$s) has not been used for over %3$d days. Please check if the address is still valid.
The withdrawal request is being sent to the Mixin mainnet. Please wait a moment.
The transfer request is being sent to the Mixin mainnet. Please wait a moment.
You transferred %1$s to the recipient %2$s ago.
The value of this transfer of %1$s is up to %2$s. Please ensure the amount is correct.
%1$s (%2$s) is not in your contacts. Please verify if the recipient is correct.
The request to revoke the multisig is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
Your signature has been revoked by the Mixin mainnet.
The request to add the address is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
The request to deleting the address is currently under verification by the Mixin server. Please wait a moment.
Your %1$s account is based on your Mixin Messenger MPC wallet and derived according to the BIP44 protocol.
It is recommended to transfer assets back to more secured Mixin wallet as soon as interactions with apps are completed.
Your assets in %1$s account and Mixin wallet are isolated but managed using the same PIN.
Asset transfers between your %1$s account and Mixin wallet incur network fees.
Unlocking your %1$s account will also automatically unlock EVM accounts such as %2$s, %3$s and others.
Allow the app to view your account address and ask for your approval to make a transaction.
Tap the send button to immediately broadcast the message or tap the discard button to discard the signed message.
This application can access all %3$s in your %1$s account (%2$s).
This app can withdraw all your %1$s.
Transaction preview unavailable, making it impossible to estimate asset changes. Be cautious and only sign transactions for apps you trust.
Please ensure you trust this app before proceeding with the request.
The message has been signed and sent successfully, please return to app to continue.
The transaction has been signed and sent successfully, Please return to app to continue.
The data has been signed and sent successfully, Please return to app to continue.
Use this address for receiving tokens on Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Base networks,
Use this address for receiving tokens on Solana.
Enter a wallet address, exchange address.
Enter the address Memo, if you don\'t directly click next
Enter the address Tag, if you don\'t directly click next
You do not have enough %1$s in your account to pay for network fees
Recommends the right slippage for different currencies to help you trade successfully
Trades will be executed according to the slippage you set
Your transaction may be frontrun and result in an unfavourable trade
Slippage cannot be greater than 50% and cannot be less than 0.1%
%1$s will be deposited into your wallet once the transaction is complete
The collectible is being released, please wait.
Releasing the collectible will immediately provide the corresponding tokens, which can be transferred, traded, or used to occupy a collectible.
This transaction change the owner of your SPL tokens. This allow the new owner to transfer the tokens without your permission.
The signature request from Mixin Messenger.
Your transaction has been sent to network and will be processed within a few minutes.
Choose how much SOL you\'d like to stake with this validator.
Your SOL is currently staked with a validator. You\'ll need to unstake to access these funds.
This is the most recent reward you earned for staking. You are rewarded 3 days.
Contract address is NOT a deposit address!
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you
This signature request is issued by %1$s.
You have already approved this transaction; you cannot approve it again.
This transaction has already been rejected by someone else; you cannot reject it again.
Visit mixin.one/mm or scan the QR code to install.
Triggered when the last price moves above or below your set price.
Triggered when the last price moves above your set price.
Triggered when the last price moves below your set price.
Triggered when the 24h gain exceeds your set price change.
Triggered when the 24h loss exceeds your set price change.
Receive an alert on every trigger event
Receive an alert once per day when the trigger event occurs
Receive an alert only on first trigger event
Price alerts require notification permission to be enabled.
The total number of price alerts for all currencies cannot exceed %1$d.
You can create a maximum of %1$d price alerts for each trading pair.
The set price cannot be the current price.
The price exceeds the maximum allowed value.
The price is below the minimum allowed value.
The price must be less than the current price.
The price must be greater than the current price.
The increase percentage must be at least 0.01%.
The decrease percentage must be at least -0.01%.
The 13 mnemonic phrases generated when creating an account are intended only for Mixin Network-related products.
The mnemonic phrase will be associated with a key shard for your MPC wallet under your management.

The MPC Wallet in Mixin Messenger is built on a decentralized key protocol (TIP). The PIN is one of the key shards. The full wallet key exists only in the TEE security environment on the current device. Read the documentation to learn %1$s.
Please complete the process in a stable network environment.
Please keep the app in the foreground and do not force quit it during the setup process.
The process cannot be canceled once it begins. Please remember the 6-digit PIN and reenter it if the process is aborted unexpectedly.
Set a 6-digit PIN for your wallet
If you lose the PIN, you will be unable to recover your wallet.
It’s rare to see a third confirmation somewhere else, so please remember the PIN is unrecoverable if lost.
Keep the app in the foreground while verifying the shard key and syncing to the TIP network. Do not force quit the app during the setup process.
What happens if I lose the PIN?
I can recover my account later.
I will lose access to my account and funds.

The MPC wallet in Mixin Messenger is built on the decentralized key protocol TIP. You can recover your account through your phone number, mnemonic phrase, or a trusted contact. The complete wallet key exists only in the TEE security environment on the current device. Read the documentation to learn %1$s.
Attention: The Recovery Kit cannot help you recover your PIN

You can log in to your account using the mnemonic phrase. The current mnemonic phrase is linked to a key shard of the MPC wallet, with the complete key existing only in the TEE security environment on the current device. Read the documentation to learn %1$s.
Read the following, then save the phrase securely.
The 13 or 25 mnemonic words generated when creating an account are for Mixin Network-related products only.
The mnemonic phrase cannot help you recover your PIN.
Ensure that no one or surveillance cameras are watching your screen.
Enter or paste your %1$d mnemonic words.
Input each word in the order it was presented to you.
Write it down on a piece of paper and keep it in a safe place.
· Store it in a vault or secure location
Protect your assets by backing up your mnemonic phrase now.

Please back up your mnemonic phrase immediately! This phrase is one of the key shards of the MPC wallet. If the device is lost or the app is uninstalled, and you haven\'t backed it up, you won\'t be able to log back into the current Mixin account (%1$s).

You can log in to your account using your mobile number. The mobile number will be associated with a key shard of your MPC wallet. The complete key exists only in the TEE security environment on the current device. Read the documentation to learn more about %1$s.

You can log in to your account using your mobile number. The current mobile number (%1$s) is associated with a key shard of your MPC wallet. The complete key exists only in the TEE security environment on the current device. Read the documentation to learn more about %2$s.
The mobile number and mnemonic phrase will link to the same key shard.
The mobile number and mnemonic phrase log into the same account.
You cannot add a mobile number registered to a Mixin Messenger account.
Once bound, the mobile number cannot be removed.
The recovery contact is designed to help you log in to your account if you are lost and cannot retrieve your mobile number or mnemonic phrase.
Add someone you trust as a recovery contact, such as your family, friends, or colleagues.
If you cannot log in to your account using your mobile number or mnemonic phrase, seek help from your recovery contact in person or by phone.
The recovery contact cannot transfer assets from your Mixin wallet but can help you regain access to your account.
The recovery contact cannot recover your PIN.
The recovery contact you want to add has downloaded and logged in to Mixin Messenger.
The recovery contact you want to add keeps Mixin Messenger online or is meeting with you face-to-face.
The recovery contact you want to add has added the current account (%1$s) as a contact; otherwise, they may not receive the verification code.
Invalid SSL Certificate. This site may be unsafe.
